The current maxim is that the Internet knows everything about you. Do you think the Internet is invading your privacy?

yes, i think that it's invading. We put our contact information, photographs frequently on the web. Doing this may be harmful in some cases. They get our contact information very easily on the internet.

But a smart way is followed by many websites that they try to make you give your information details to them for any reason. They will tell you that it is for future reference and updates will be sent to you regarding their pdoduct.
